WRITING.TITLE: Just Released Skins! Sun Wu- Kongs Shaolin Monk-y IN action!

I got into a game 5 minutes late with agni, so I bought midas boots to catch up and I was doing pretty well 0 Magic Power, Decided to see what happens if build him as a tanky, mobile, zoning, aoe, initiating bruiser . . . . . . . . . (greatest comeback so far for me)

WRITING.TEXT:
Works wll with teams relying on there Artemes to chesee them a win, or making Odin AOE comp, and you pop ulti.
I often traded the Aura to allies chest for a Frozen mallet since they expect me to follow them, when they should follow the baby wrecking ball, which allowed me to slaughter the enemy.
